author: sussman
msg: * ch00.xml: first pass at a Preface.

author: dws
msg: packages/rpm/redhat-8.x/subversion.spec: The RPM now includes a statically
built svnadmin program which is copied to a backup file when the RPM
is upgraded or erased, so the user can still dump/load if the Berkeley
DB format has changed in a new RPM or an emergency backup needs to be
made and shared libraries are missing, etc.

author: dws
msg: packages/rpm/redhat-8.x/subversion.spec: Brand the release number into the
version number that is displayed from the "svn --version" command.
This will help determine the version number more specifically, though one

author: jerenkrantz
msg: * notes/autoversion-compatibility.txt: Add notes concerning the WebDAVFS
client in Mac OS X.  (redirect-carefully was, indeed, a red herring.)
